mapper.insert: insert into lg_perms (permsId, url, permsName, perms, `desc`, createBy, createTime, updateBy, updateTime, remark1, remark2) values (#{permsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update lg_perms set url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permsName = #{permsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, perms = #{perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `desc` = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createBy = #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateBy = #{updateby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark1 = #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark2 = #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where permsId = #{permsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select permsId, url, permsName, perms, `desc`, createBy, createTime, updateBy, updateTime, remark1, remark2 from lg_perms where permsId = #{permsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select permsId, url, permsName, perms, `desc`, createBy, createTime, updateBy, updateTime, remark1, remark2 from lg_perms
